title: Umm Salal SC Signs French Coach Patrice Carteron
snippet: Doha, June 30 (QNA) - Umm Salal SC officially signed French coach Patrice Carteron to lead the club's first football team. The club stated Monday that the 54-year-old coach signed a contract to lead the first team for the upcoming 2025–2026 ...

title: Umm Salal | QSL
snippet: Umm Salal coach Patrice Carteron spoke to the media ahead of their 2025-2026 Doha Bank Stars League Week 7 match against Al Sadd. “The game would be difficult against one of the league’s strongest teams, but also presents a significant challenge for my team.

title: Coley aims higher up the football coaching ladder - Jamaica Observer
snippet: Over the last four years he has been with Umm Salal in the Qatar Stars League and is aiming for more opportunities. “I equipped myself well and I am ready to take my career a step further,” said Coley, who currently serves as the reserve team head coach at Umm Salal.
